subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James tied a career high with 15 assists and Shaquille O’Neal to help the Cleveland Cavaliers beat the worn-down Memphis Grizzlies for their ninth straight victory.
snippet: LeBron James tied a career high with 15 assists and Shaquille O’Neal to help the Cleveland Cavaliers beat the worn-down Memphis Grizzlies for their ninth straight victory.
